enter_user_id.title: MagentaTV: {name} - Configure User Id
enter_user_id.description:
For Homeassistant MagentaTV to connect to your media receiver you will need to provide your user id.
 Follow these steps to find your personal user id:
 1. Navigate to [web.magentatv.de/einstellungen/system](https://web.magentatv.de/einstellungen/system)
 2. Login using the same account that the receiver is using
 3. Copy your `ANID` from the system info tab and paste it into the field below
